summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 27, 2019. It records the official inmate count and roster for that date, including a specific entry for inmate Davila. The document is significant as it provides administrative prison records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Davila
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 76256-054, categorized under HOSP (hospital) assignment.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording a total census of 767 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated July 27, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It records an official inmate count showing a total census of 767 inmates across various housing units (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).
An inmate roster section lists inmate Davila (REG NO 76256-054) with a HOSP (hospital) assignment.
The document is part of standard prison administrative records, showing the operational procedures for inmate tracking and counts.
The date (July 27, 2019) is significant as it falls within the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at the MCC New York facility.
